description:
Bonobono`s father says he`s gotten fat. Bonobono wonders what it`s like to be fat and asks Chipmunk and Raccoon. Neither of them has ever been fat, so they don`t know. Then Wolverine`s father shows up and he`s gotten fat somehow! It turns out he ate some Fat Grass. Bonobono and his friends eat some Fat Grass, too. The next day...
Source: crunchyroll
